body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia             Photos & Multimedia        Social Media         Find us on Facebook! Saratoga National Historical Park has a Facebook account, featuring info and updates on activities at the park, shared thoughts from park fans, photos from special events, and more.         Follow us on Twitter! Another way to follow current news from the park and share your photos and experiences.      Cell Phone Tours Virtual Park Tours Photo Gallery
title: Saratoga National Historical Park: Photos & Multimedia
